Desire 310

Important

Warning this device is one of HTCs early Mediatek devices and has many bugs and flaws, it is unlocked via Furious golds OTSmart module however it is a very dangerous operation which can often destroy the devices IMEI and serial number. if you MUST unlock it ensure you take a FULL dump of the device before you begin.

Unlocking

Do not attempt without contacting software dept

Flashing

  1. Open SPFlashtools on your PC
  2. Select the Scatter button and select the scatter.txt file from the devices folder
  3. Untick the Preloader file from the list of files to be flashed
  4. Press the Download button
  5. Connect the powered off device to the PC via micro USB
  6. The software will now catch the devices loader port and begin flashing
  7. A green circle will be displayed on completion of the flash
  8. Ensure the device has retained its IMEI number and Serial number and that no error message is displayed
  9. You can now repack the device

If you encounter any error messages or lost data contact a member of the software department
